amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the State Department's Bureau of International Narcotics and Law Enforcement Affairs to acquire a refueling vessel for the benefit of U.S. and allied drug interdiction agencies operating in the eastern Pacific region.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in the Congressional Record to authorize $25 million in FY 2006 and $25 million for FY 2007 for acquisition of a maritime refueling support vessel for United States drug interdiction efforts in the eastern Pacific maritime transit zone.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Souder amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Souder.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Souder amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
